name: Conclusive Ovation
description: When Lyney is on the field and has this card equipped, the damage dealt by Lyney and your Grin-Malkin Hat will deal +2 DMG to characters affected by Pyro. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: When $[A1310] is on the field and has this card equipped, the damage dealt by $[A1310] and your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113101]</color> will deal +2 DMG to characters <color=#FF9999FF>affected by {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro</color>. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: When Lyney is on the field and has this card equipped, the damage dealt by Lyney and your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Grin-Malkin Hat</color> will deal +2 DMG to characters <color=#FF9999FF>affected by {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro</color>. (Once per Round)
